head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGOWAN, WILLIAM J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGOWAN, WILLIAM J.

block.p: McGOWAN-William J. Of Croton, on July 1, 2000. Retired NYPD Detective Captain and a founder of the NYC Police Emerald Society. Also the owner of Danny Boy's Pub in Manhattan. Husband of the late Ellen (nee Lilienthal). Father of William, Terrance, Kevin, Bryan, Sean, Elly, Laureen, Regina, and the late Maureen. Funeral mass Thursday, 10 AM, Holy Name of Mary R.C. Church. Reposing Edward F. Carter Funeral Home, 41 Grand St, Croton, on Wednesday 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Interment L.I. National Cemetery.
